parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the arrow head; index begins at 0

title: IDatumTargetSym.IGetArrowHeadAtIndex
description: Gets information on the specified arrow head in this datum target symbol.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the arrow head; index begins at 0

remarks:
The return value is the following array of doubles:
[
arrowHeadPt[3], arrowHeadDir[3], arrowHeadWidth, arrowHeadHeight, arrowHeadStyle
]
where:
arrowHeadPt[3]
XYZ arrow head tip location
arrowHeadDir[3]
XYZ arrow head direction
arrowHeadWidth
Arrow head width where the width is measured along the arrow head direction
arrowHeadHeight
Arrow head height
arrowHeadStyle
Arrow head style as defined in
swArrowStyle_e
